channel.title: Streefi - Street Food Discovery Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, news, and features from Streefi - Your ultimate street food discovery platform

item.title: Streefi App Now Live - Discover Street Food Near You!
item.description: Download the Streefi app on iOS and Android to discover authentic street food vendors, support local food heroes, and enjoy exclusive dine-in offers.
item.author: support@streefi.in (Streefi Team)

item.title: Supporting Local Food Heroes - Our Mission
item.description: Learn how Streefi is empowering local street food vendors and creating a community of food lovers who support authentic street food culture.
item.author: support@streefi.in (Streefi Team)
